task.title: Deleting the transfer configuration by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can delete the automatic log transfer configuration by using the imaserver delete LogAutoTransfer command.

step.cmd: To delete the LogAutoTransfer configuration, enter the following command:

info.note: The command must be capitalized as shown.

taskbody.example: The following example deletes the automatic log transfer configuration: delete LogAutoTransfer The requested configuration change has completed successfully.
